name: ABC
text: NEW: Former Vice Pres. Joe Biden retains his Secret Service code name of "Celtic" and his running mate Sen. Kamala Harris assumes the code name "Pioneer," source confirms to @ABC News. https://t.co/V0yStlxtpJ https://t.co/JvRcs3LsM9

name: ABC
text: 68% of Americans say the economy is in not-so-good or poor shape, the most in @ABC News/WaPo polls since October 2014. https://t.co/zoqjUTPKPP https://t.co/7uKjFRPVqT

name: ABC
text: EXCLUSIVE: @DavidMuir to conduct the first joint sit-down with Joe Biden and Kamala Harris and @RobinRoberts to interview Biden and Harris on their history-making ticket. The one-hour primetime special next Sunday 8 p.m. on @ABC. https://t.co/2NbmDTDqOO https://t.co/ua4mFCG7i1

name: ABC
text:
The Democratic National Convention will kick off with a focus on the three major crises gripping the nation: the coronavirus pandemic, the economic downturn and the national reckoning over racial injustice.

@ABC News has complete coverage https://t.co/1RaGw5up50 #DemConvention https://t.co/oG8jjqmVUw

name: ABC
text: BREAKING: The Democratic National Convention officially gets underway with the theme of unity and featuring speakers who represent the party's progressive and traditional platforms. WATCH LIVE: https://t.co/yx5RMYCxBm

name: ABC
text:
NEW: Rep. Bennie Thompson gavels in the first night of the #DemConvention.

Follow along for live updates and tune in to @ABCNewsLive for full coverage: https://t.co/00Tc2gNfRB https://t.co/m2qsXF1lsX

name: ABC
text:
NEW: Rep. Bennie Thompson gavels in the first night of the #DemConvention.

Follow along for live updates and tune… https://t.co/TSG7zV0iZ7

name: ABC
text: Joe Biden's grandchildren lead the Pledge of Allegiance on the first night of the #DemConvention. https://t.co/ox37AApufY https://t.co/3xB1dSlBNo

name: ABC
text: Joe Biden's grandchildren lead the Pledge of Allegiance on the first night of the #DemConvention. https://t.co/NFCK2ZqNNI https://t.co/XCBFcxIVjQ

name: ABC
text: A choir performs the National Anthem virtually, with singers representing all 50 states, the District of Columbia, the Cherokee Nation and five territories at the start of the 2020 #DemConvention. https://t.co/U4wuWUc53u https://t.co/K3KX6mCeMy

name: ABC
text: In conversation with Houston Police Chief Art Acevedo about police reforms in the wake of the death of George Floyd, Joe Biden says, "Most cops are good. But the fact is, the bad ones have ot be identified and prosecuted and out—period." https://t.co/ox37AApufY https://t.co/nT8Ur58Uaq

name: ABC
text: In conversation with Houston Police Chief Art Acevedo about police reforms in the wake of the death of George Floyd, Joe Biden says, "Most cops are good. But the fact is, the bad ones have to be identified and prosecuted and out—period." https://t.co/ox37AAH57w https://t.co/5agqQtR2SF

name: ABC
text: Gwen Carr, the mother of Eric Garner, at the #DemConvention: "I know when my son was murdered, there was a big uprising, but then it settled down. We can't let things settle down." https://t.co/nBZzx1SRxD https://t.co/zKpf3qCLxT

name: ABC
text:
The Democratic National Convention is underway with the theme of unity and featuring speakers who represent the party's progressive and traditional platforms. 

WATCH LIVE: https://t.co/eYgAoJonnH

name: ABC
text:
The Democratic National Convention is underway with the theme of unity and featuring speakers who represent the party's progressive and traditional platforms. 

WATCH LIVE: https://t.co/mLUiNr2ixH

name: ABC
text: Former Trump administration official endorses Joe Biden: "Even though I disagree on key issues, I'm confident that Joe Biden will protect the country, and I'm confident he won't make the same mistakes as this president." https://t.co/RvY3ZuHwYi

name: ABC
text:
Gov. Andrew Cuomo: "COVID is the symptom, not the illness."

"A virus attacks when the body is weak and when it cannot defend itself. Over these past few years, America's body politic has been weakened...Only a strong body can fight off the virus." https://t.co/ox37AApufY https://t.co/5sjBQm9puH

name: ABC
text: Gov. Andrew Cuomo: "Donald Trump didn’t create the initial division. The division created Trump. He only made it worse.” https://t.co/UJ6YMYonX2 https://t.co/qDePFJaSIe

name: ABC
text: RT @GMA: NY Gov. Cuomo: "Today we trail the world in defeating COVID... Americans learned a critical lesson. How vulnerable we are when we are divided." https://t.co/ybtKNcHIWH https://t.co/LrNaVia76Z

name: ABC
text: Kristen Urquiza, who lost her father to COVID-19: “My dad was a healthy 65-year-old. His only preexisting condition was trusting Donald Trump, and for that, he paid with his life.” https://t.co/NFCK2ZqNNI https://t.co/VCNtNQRB2C

name: ABC
text:
"We have to think about more than one party—we have to think about the very core of our democracy. And that's why you're about to hear from some unexpected voices."

GOP speakers introduced at #DemConvention: https://t.co/ox37AApufY https://t.co/Y7CfAolUy8

name: ABC
text:
Former Ohio Gov. John Kasich speaks at the #DemConvention: “We’re being taken down the wrong road by a president who has pitted one against the other.”

“I’m a lifelong Republican, but that attachment holds second place to my responsibility to my country.” https://t.co/ox37AApufY https://t.co/TaWoUDzqAb

name: ABC
text: Former GOP presidential candidate John Kasich speaks at the #DemConvention: "I’m a lifelong Republican—but that attachment holds second place to my responsibility to my country." https://t.co/eota9GkayR https://t.co/QlNt8RSiy5

name: ABC
text: Kristin Urquiza, who lost her father to COVID-19: “My dad was a healthy 65-year-old. His only preexisting condition was trusting Donald Trump, and for that, he paid with his life.” https://t.co/NFCK2ZqNNI https://t.co/Tk1UlGmP1P

name: ABC
text: Citing Pres. Trump's comments on the U.S. Postal Service, deployment of federal agents to U.S. cities, and suggestion of delaying the election, Sen. Bernie Sanders says, "This is not normal—and we must never treat it like it is." https://t.co/ox37AApufY https://t.co/w9W8GHahT6

name: ABC
text: Sen. Bernie Sanders addresses his supporters during #DemConvention speech: “Together, we have moved this country in a bold new direction … but let us be clear, if Donald Trump is reelected, all of the progress we have made will be in jeopardy.” https://t.co/ox37AApufY https://t.co/IRzZgalvrH

name: ABC
text:
WATCH LIVE: Former First Lady Michelle Obama delivers remarks at the 2020 Democratic National Convention. 

Watch ABC News Live for complete coverage and analysis: https://t.co/mLUiNr2ixH

name: ABC
text:
“Nero fiddled while Rome burned. Trump golfs.”

In #DemConvention speech, Sen. Bernie Sanders says “by rejecting science,” President Trump has “put our lives and health in jeopardy” and “fanned this pandemic.” https://t.co/ox37AApufY https://t.co/4bZUwS2MXO

name: ABC
text: Bernie Sanders to those who didn't vote for Biden in the primary, or who voted for Donald Trump in 2016: "The future of our democracy is at stake. The future of our economy is at stake. The future of our planet is at stake. We must...defeat Donald Trump." https://t.co/ox37AApufY https://t.co/V9VFH8jFBp

name: ABC
text:
Michelle Obama: "It's a hard time, and everyone's feeling it in different ways."

"I am here tonight because I love this country with all my heart—and it pains me to see so many people hurting." https://t.co/ox37AApufY #DemConvention https://t.co/kzpMYWNLn2

name: ABC
text: Former first lady Michelle Obama: “Four years ago, too many people chose to believe that their votes didn’t matter…and we’ve all been living with the consequences.” https://t.co/tAYJONjZNt #DemConvention https://t.co/chZ38vuJpq

name: ABC
text: Former first lady Michelle Obama: “As George Floyd, Breonna Taylor, and a never-ending list of innocent people of color continue to be murdered, stating the simple fact that a Black life matters is still met with derision from the nation's highest office.” https://t.co/tAYJONjZNt https://t.co/procerb79F

name: ABC
text: Former first lady Michelle Obama: “Being president doesn’t change who you are, it reveals who you are  … a presidential election can reveal who we are, too.” https://t.co/ox37AApufY #DemConvention https://t.co/UVO9DPlt4I

name: ABC
text: Michelle Obama: "Right now, kids in this country are seeing what happens when we stop requiring empathy of one another. They're looking around wondering if we've been lying to them this whole time about who we are and what we truly value." https://t.co/ox37AApufY #DemConvention https://t.co/SCg3dkyfAv

name: ABC
text: Former first lady Michelle Obama: “Let me be as honest and clear as I possibly can. Donald Trump is the wrong president for our country. He has had more than enough time to prove that he can do the job, but he is clearly in over his head.” https://t.co/NFCK2ZqNNI #DemConvention https://t.co/9wRWB9G4Qf

name: ABC
text: Michelle Obama: "We have to vote for Joe Biden in numbers that cannot be ignored. Because right now, folks who know they cannot win fair and square at the ballot box are doing everything they can to stop us from voting." https://t.co/ox37AApufY #DemConvention https://t.co/txKQg9PCxd

name: ABC
text: Michelle Obama: “Joe is not perfect. And he’d be the first to tell you that. But there is no perfect candidate ... and his ability to learn and grow—we find in that the kind of humility and maturity that so many of us yearn for right now.” https://t.co/ox37AApufY #DemConvention https://t.co/ZOEFWuQbQO

name: ABC
text: Michelle Obama: "This is not the time to withhold our votes in protest or play games with candidates who have no ch… https://t.co/VRoN1BaSFx

name: ABC
text: Michelle Obama: "We've gotta vote early, in person if we can. We've got to request our mail-in ballots right now, tonight, and send them back immediately and follow up to make sure they're received, and then make sure our friends and families do the same." https://t.co/ox37AApufY https://t.co/sgDuOU8l51

name: ABC
text: Former GOP presidential candidate John Kasich speaks at the #DemConvention: "I have known Joe Biden for 30 years...I know Joe is a good man." https://t.co/NFCK2ZqNNI https://t.co/84ohPNW202

name: ABC
text: RT @ABCPolitics: 3 key takeaways from first night of the Democratic National Convention: https://t.co/hij6nsv0m5 #DemConvention

name: ABC
text:
Michelle Obama quotes John Lewis in closing comments: "When you see something that is not right...you must do something."

"That is the truest form of empathy," Obama says. "Not just feeling, but doing. Not just for ourselves...but for everyone." https://t.co/ox37AApufY https://t.co/OdHmGgtc3v

name: ABC
text: Michelle Obama: "This is not the time to withhold our votes in protest or play games with candidates who have no chance of winning. We have got to vote like we did in 2008 and 2012." https://t.co/vTPkul1KSR #DemConvention https://t.co/Srwtcb4ONa

name: ABC
text: Joe Biden's grandchildren led the Pledge of Allegiance on the first night of the #DemConvention. https://t.co/NFCK2ZqNNI https://t.co/TMj13Fq3MH

name: ABC
text:
Michelle Obama took aim at Donald Trump by name in her 2020 DNC keynote address, calling him the "wrong president for our country."

"He simply cannot be who we need him to be for us," said the former first lady. "It is what it is." https://t.co/skNvjYvYQK #DemConvention https://t.co/X25k5GdnAb

name: ABC
text: Former first lady Michelle Obama: “Let me be as honest and clear as I possibly can. Donald Trump is the wrong president for our country. He has had more than enough time to prove that he can do the job, but he is clearly in over his head.” https://t.co/NFCK2ZqNNI #DemConvention https://t.co/H0nVdssjfX
